alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 12:39AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Dale and northeastern Coffee Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1239 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elba, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elba, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, New Brockton, Richburg, Mixons Crossroads, Victoria, Eanon, Lowry Mill, Camp Humming Hills, Clintonville, Wise Mill, Shell Army Field, Tabernacle, Camp Alaflo Bsa, Arcus and Woodland Grove Church. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
